pricing.multipleYearsMessage: Extending for multiple years will save money on network costs by avoiding yearly transactions.
pricing.primaryNameMessage: This links your address to this IP, allowing apps to display this IP as your profile when connected to them.

premium.heading: This IP has a temporary premium
premium.subheading: To give fair opportunity to recently expired IP, the premium starts at $100,000,000 and reduces to $0 over 21 days. You can calculate the premium on a date below.
premium.timezone: Date and time shown in local time zone ({{timezone}})

profile.visibilityMessage: Your IP will be stored on the blockchain. Anything you add will be publicly visible.

complete.heading: Congratulations!
complete.subheading: You are now the owner of
complete.description: Your IP was successfully registered. You can now view and manage your naIPme.

info.heading: Before we start
info.subheading: Registering your IP takes three steps
items: Complete a transaction to begin the timer
Wait 60 seconds for the timer to complete
Complete a second transaction to secure your IP
info.setupProfile: I'd like to set up my profile first

transactions.heading: Almost there
transactions.subheading: This timer prevents others from registering this IP before you do.
